Name: Form.Switch
LongDesc: The Switch component provides a multi-position toggle switch UI element for forms. It supports a configurable number of positions (e.g., 2 for on/off, 3 for off/mid/on, etc.), and allows users to cycle through positions by clicking. The component is built using only div elements and exposes methods for value, position count, change handler, and disabled state.
Example: var sw = Q.Form.Switch(3, 0); sw.change(function(pos) { console.log('Switch position:', pos); }); sw.disabled(true);
